title: Arugula And Pear Salad
summary: Need a gluten free, primal, and vegetarian main course? Arugulan And Pear Salad could be an awesome recipe to try. One portion of this dish contains around 15g of protein, 37g of fat, and a total of 428 calories. This recipe serves 4 and costs $2.04 per serving. This recipe from rachaelray.com has 4 fans. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 45 minutes. If you have salt and pepper, arugula, lemon, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the anjou pear you could follow this main course with the Red Anjou Pie as a dessert. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 59%. This score is pretty good. Similar recipes include Arugulan and Pear Salad, Arugula & Pear Salad, and Pomegranate, Pear and Arugula Salad.
